description_for_human: Query Bloxs real estate data: properties, tenants, contracts, maintenance and financials. Get portfolio insights, vacancy analysis, and KPIs.
description_for_model:
Bloxs real estate OData API (read-only). Use Code Interpreter for calculations.

## Critical Rules
- Use $top=30, $select for efficiency
- FinancialMutations: ALWAYS $filter + $top<=50
- Labels (Status/State) are tenant-specific: query lookup endpoints first
- Vacancy check requires Python (extern beheer logic)

functions.name: getUnits
functions.description: Rental units. Key: UnitId, RealEstateObjectId, DisplayAddress, OwnerId, OccupationPercentage, ComplexId, SectionId, ActiveContractRentId, ManagementState, EnergyLabel. For vacancy: filter OccupationPercentage lt 1, exclude VERKOCHT, use Python for extern beheer check.

functions.name: getBuildings
functions.description: Get standalone buildings. Filter by OwnerId for owner-specific properties. Use DisplayAddress for location.

functions.name: getComplexes
functions.description: Get complexes (multi-unit properties). Check OccupationPercentage for vacancy rate.

functions.name: getCommercialOverview
functions.description: BEST for portfolio dashboard - no joins needed. Contains Address, OwnerName, TenantName, IsOccupied, BareRent_Yearly_TotalAmountExcl (EUR), ContractStartDate, ContractEndDate. Calculate: total rent, occupancy rate, contract expiry risk.

functions.name: getCommercialOverviewSpecific
functions.description: Extended commercial overview with EnergyLabel, TheoreticalRent, FutureContractStartDate for deeper analysis.

functions.name: getRealEstateObjects
functions.description: Base table for all property types. Use specific tables (Units, Buildings) when OwnerId filtering is needed.

functions.name: getSections
functions.description: Get sections within complexes for hierarchical portfolio views.

functions.name: getAddresses
functions.description: Get address records with Street, City, PostalCode, Latitude, Longitude for geodata.

functions.name: getOwners
functions.description: Get property owners with DisplayName, Email, RelationId for linking to other entities.

functions.name: getPersons
functions.description: Get persons (tenants, contacts) with RelationId to link to contracts.

functions.name: getRelations
functions.description: Base table for all relation types (persons, organisations, suppliers).

functions.name: getSalesContracts
functions.description: CONTRACT MANAGEMENT: Rent contracts. Filter IsEnded eq false for active. For expiry risk: EndDate lt [date]. Key: SalesContractId, Reference, RelationName, OwnerName, StartDate, EndDate, IsEnded. Combine with getSalesContractLineItems for rent amounts per property.

functions.name: getSalesContractRealestateObjects
functions.description: Link table: SalesContractId to RealEstateObjectId. Use for contract-to-property joins.

functions.name: getSalesContractLineItems
functions.description: LOOKUP TABLE: Contract line item type definitions (bare rent, service costs, etc). NOT actual amounts! Key: SalesContractLineItemId, Name, ContractType, LedgerAccountId, IsBareRent, IsIndexable, ItemType. For actual rent amounts per property, use getSalesContractLines instead.

functions.name: getSalesContractLines
functions.description: Contract lines by RealEstateObjectId. Best source for contract history: query by RealEstateObjectId, collect SalesContractId values, then fetch SalesContracts.

functions.name: getServiceTickets
functions.description: MAINTENANCE ANALYSIS: Service tickets - NO JOINS needed. Contains RealEstateObjectName, TenantName, SupplierName, ServiceTicketStateName. For open tickets: first getServiceTicketStates to discover state names. Combine with getPurchaseInvoices for cost analysis.

functions.name: getServiceTicketStates
functions.description: Valid ticket states (tenant-specific). Key: ServiceTicketStateId, Name, SystemState (Active/OnHold/SignedOff/Done), IsArchived. Query first to discover state names before filtering ServiceTickets.

functions.name: getServiceTicketProblemCategories
functions.description: Ticket problem categories (tenant-specific). Discover valid labels before filtering tickets.

functions.name: getServiceTicketCostCategories
functions.description: Ticket cost categories for maintenance cost classification.

functions.name: getFinancialMutations
functions.description: FINANCIAL DEEP-DIVE: Ledger transactions. **ALWAYS** $filter + $top<=100. Key: TransactionDate, LedgerAccountCode, LedgerAccountName, Amount, Debit, Credit, RealEstateObjectName, RelationName, OwnerName, InvoiceReference, FinancialYear, JournalType. For mortgages: first getLedgerAccounts(contains Name 'hypothe'), then filter by LedgerAccountCode.

functions.name: getLedgerAccounts
functions.description: Chart of accounts. Use contains(Name,'hypothe') to find mortgage account codes for FinancialMutations.

functions.name: getSalesInvoices
functions.description: Sales invoices to tenants. Filter by FinancialYear. WorkflowState is tenant-specific.

functions.name: getSalesInvoiceLines
functions.description: Invoice lines with RealEstateObjectId for property-level allocation. Filter by SalesInvoiceId.

functions.name: getPurchaseInvoices
functions.description: COST ANALYSIS: Purchase invoices from suppliers. Filter FinancialYear eq 2026. Key: PurchaseInvoiceId, Reference, InvoiceDate, TotalValueIncluding, RelationName, RealEstateObjectName. If RealEstateObjectName empty: use getPurchaseInvoiceLines. Calculate: costs per property, cost/m¬≤.

functions.name: getPurchaseInvoiceLines
functions.description: Invoice lines with RealEstateObjectId. Use when header lacks property info; filter by PurchaseInvoiceId.

functions.name: getOpenPositionDebtors
functions.description: RISK ANALYSIS: Outstanding receivables. Filter Age gt 30 for overdue payments. Key: RelationName, OutstandingAmount, Age, DueDate, OwnerName. Calculate: total arrears, DSO, tenant risk score. Combine with getSalesContracts for tenant context.

functions.name: getOpenPositionCreditors
functions.description: Creditor aging with outstanding amounts to suppliers.

functions.name: getFinancingContracts
functions.description: Financing contracts (loans/mortgages). Often empty; prefer LedgerAccounts + FinancialMutations for mortgage data.

functions.name: getPropertyValuationValues
functions.description: VALUATION DATA: WOZ values per property. Filter ValuationYear eq 2026. Key: RealEstateObjectId, RealEstateObjectName, Value, ValuationYear. Combine with getUnits(OwnerId) for owner-specific WOZ. Calculate: total portfolio value, LTV ratio.

functions.name: getTheoreticalRentItems
functions.description: VACANCY COST ANALYSIS: Market rent per property. Combine with getUnits(vacant) to calculate ‚Ç¨-impact of vacancy. Key: RealEstateObjectId, RealEstateObjectName, Amount. Sum Amount for total potential rent loss.

functions.name: getInstallations
functions.description: Equipment with NextMaintenanceOn, LastMaintainedOn, ExpectedCosts for maintenance planning. Key: InstallationId, Reference, Description, RealEstateObjectId, InstallationTypeId, SupplierId, BuildYear.

functions.name: getMeters
functions.description: Utility meters (electricity, gas, water) per property.

functions.name: getMeterReadings
functions.description: Meter reading values over time. Link via MeterId.

functions.name: getTasks
functions.description: System tasks and reminders with Deadline, Status fields.

functions.name: getNotes
functions.description: Notes attached to entities. Filter by EntityLinkType (Unit=13, Building=11, Complex=12, Person=4, Owner=1, ServiceTicket=63) and EntityId.

functions.name: getOwnerSettlements
functions.description: Owner settlements per period with TotalSettlementBalance.

functions.name: getControlList
functions.description: COMPREHENSIVE PRE-JOINED VIEW - owner+property+unit+tenant+contract in one call. Key: OwnerName, RealEstateObjectName, UnitName, IsOccupied, BVO, VVO, TenantName, SalesContractReference, SalesContractStartDate, SalesContractEndDate, SalesContractNoticePeriod, SalesContractNoticeDate, SalesContractIndexationName, SalesContractDepositAmount, RealEstateObjectCadastralNumber, RealEstateObjectMandateAmount. PREFERRED over CommercialOverview when you need contract notice periods, cadastral numbers, or mandate amounts.

functions.name: getCommercialRentSalesContracts
functions.description: Commercial rent contracts with BREAK OPTION date. Key: BreakOption, SalesContractId, Reference, RelationName, OwnerName, StartDate, EndDate, DepositAmount. Use BreakOption for commercial lease risk analysis.

functions.name: getPurchaseOrders
functions.description: Purchase orders to suppliers with approval workflow. Key: PurchaseOrderId, Reference, Subject, TotalAmountExcl, WorkflowState, FinalizationState, FirstRealEstateObjectName, CurrentAssignedApproverDisplayName.

functions.name: getPurchaseOrderLines
functions.description: Purchase order lines with property allocation. Key: PurchaseOrderLineId, PurchaseOrderId, Description, RealEstateObjectId, AmountExcl.

functions.name: getPurchaseContracts
functions.description: Supplier/purchase contracts (service agreements, hire). Key: PurchaseContractId, Reference, Type (Supplier/PrivateHire/CommercialHire), RelationName, OwnerName, StartDate, EndDate, IsEnded, NoticePeriod.

functions.name: getPurchaseContractLines
functions.description: Purchase contract line items with amounts. Key: PurchaseContractLineId, PurchaseContractId, RealEstateObjectId, AmountExcl, AmountIncl, StartDate, EndDate.

functions.name: getBudgets
functions.description: Operating and investment budgets per owner/year. Key: BudgetId, BudgetType, OwnerId, OwnerName, FinancialYear. Combine with getBudgetLedgerAccounts for monthly budget amounts.

functions.name: getBudgetLedgerAccounts
functions.description: BUDGET VS ACTUAL: Monthly budget amounts per ledger account. Key: BudgetId, LedgerAccountId, LedgerAccountCode, JanuaryAmount..DecemberAmount, TotalAmount. Compare with FinancialMutations for variance analysis.

functions.name: getFinancingContractInstalments
functions.description: Mortgage/loan instalment schedule with interest/redemption breakdown. Key: FinancingContractId, InstalmentIndex, StartDate, EndDate, InterestPercentage, Payment, Interest, Redemption, InstalmentStartAmount, InstalmentEndAmount.

functions.name: getPaymentRemindersRelation
functions.description: COLLECTION TRACKING: Payment reminder status per tenant. Key: RelationName, OwnerName, TotalOutstandingAmount, PaymentReminderPhase (None/FirstReminderSent/SecondReminderSent/ThirdReminderSent/SentToDebtCollectingAgency), LastActionOn, ExcludedUntil.

functions.name: getIndexationMethods
functions.description: Indexation methods for rent adjustments. Key: IndexationMethodId, Name, Type (MonthlyIndex/YearlyIndex/FixedRate/FixedValue), IndexationSeriesName, MinimumIndexRate, MaximumIndexRate, FixedIndexRate.

functions.name: getIndexationSeriesValues
functions.description: Indexation series values (CPI data) per year/month. Key: IndexationSeriesId, IndexationSeriesName, Value, CalendarYear, CalendarMonth.
